title: UK trade in services by business characteristics
description: Breakdown of UK trade in services by business characteristics on a balance of payments basis using a new experimental dataset.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll to Edition in this dataset and locate the current dataset

Industry: Selected as all non-blank values from cell ref A1 down.

Ownership: Selected as all non-blank values from cell ref B1 down.

Measure_Type: Selected as the two values in cells C1 and D1
